description.p: Atomic Rebase Tool is a specialized utility for rebasing ostree-based systems to different atomic images. It provides an easy-to-use interface for switching between different Universal Blue and Fedora atomic desktop variants.

ul.li: Quick selection of popular atomic images (Silverblue, Kinoite, Bazzite, etc.)
Support for different variants (NVIDIA, Developer editions, etc.)
Custom image URL support for advanced users
Real-time progress tracking with detailed logs

description.p: Major release - Complete rewrite as specialized tool

ul.li: Fixed "remove with cleanup -p" error during rebase
Added proper cleanup before rebase operations
Enhanced Fedora support with latest tag option
Improved error handling and user feedback

description.p: Initial release of standalone Atomic Rebase Tool

ul.li: Support for all major Universal Blue images
Support for Fedora Silverblue and Kinoite
